revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Digletts Cave |image = [[File:Digletts Cave.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of Digletts Cave. |tokens = 95 |location = Entrance 1: North of Viridian Forest, on Route 2.
Entrance 2: East of Vermilion City, on Route 11. }} '''Digletts Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 1,208 HP. == Encounter Tables == ===Wild Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Diglett.png|40px]] Diglett || colspan=2|
N/A |- |} ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- |[[File:Dugtrio.png|40px]] Dugtrio ||
6,040 || colspan=3|
N/A |} ==Items== ===No Debuff=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears !! Requirement |- | {{Bag2|XClick}} || 4 || 50.00% || 49.80% || 49.04% || rowspan=2|
